name: Soppel
description:
Soppel is a top down bullet-hell game by Faxdoc about descending a pit of trash and garbage. Fight mechs and robots in an attempt to find out what lies at the bottom. 

Controls: 

  • WASD: Move
  • SPACE: Jump
  • LEFT CLICK: Swing weapon
  • RIGHT CLICK: Special 

One year ago I made this small game but couldn't release it due to some complications.  It's still not finished, but I still feel like it might be worth uploading.
